## Compare DE genes between MARVEL and DESeq2 Pseudobulk

The purpose of this script is to compare pseudobulk gene expression analysis to the marvel DEGs from a wilcoxon rank-sum test. It is dependent on seurat scripts 01 and 02, and deseq2 01. It should be run in docker 1.1.0.

## Load packages

```{r load packages}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(here)
  library(styler)
  library(lintr)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(patchwork)
  library(ComplexHeatmap)
  library(viridis)
  library(Seurat)
  library(Matrix.utils)
  library(edgeR)
  library(Matrix)
  library(reshape2)
  library(S4Vectors)
  library(SingleCellExperiment)
  library(pheatmap)
  library(apeglm)
  library(png)
  library(DESeq2)
  library(RColorBrewer)
  library(data.table)
})

source(here(
  "src",
  "deseq2",
  "functions.R"
))

```
